references.paper_title: Hierarchical text-conditional image generation with clip latents
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the field of text-to-image generation, introducing a hierarchical approach that significantly improves image quality.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces latent diffusion models, a crucial advancement in image generation that significantly improves efficiency and enables higher-resolution outputs.

references.paper_title: Photorealistic text-to-image diffusion models with deep language understanding
references.reason: This paper demonstrates a major step toward photorealistic image generation, leveraging deep language understanding to improve the realism and fidelity of generated images.

references.paper_title: Imagereward: Learning and evaluating human preferences for text-to-image generation
references.reason: This paper introduces a key method used in UniFL, demonstrating the effectiveness of incorporating human feedback to improve the aesthetic quality of generated images.

references.paper_title: SDXL: Improving latent diffusion models for high-resolution image synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduces SDXL, a significant improvement on latent diffusion models used as a baseline in the UniFL experiments, allowing for higher-resolution image generation.
